document.full_text: in david greenspan's new play, 'go back to where you are,' he is also an actor, playing a demon traveling through time on a mission of salvation.
document.title: theater review | 'go back to where you are': from amphitheater bit player to god's errand boy
lines_and_colors: in david greenspan's new play, 'go back to where you are,' he is also an actor, playing a demon traveling through time on a mission of salvation.
